thread.title: Aagam team to dedicate a song to Abdul Kalam
thread.title_full: Aagam team to dedicate a song to Abdul Kalam - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Aagam team to dedicate a song to Abdul Kalam
text:
The team of Aagam is planning to depict a song as a tribute to the former President Dr APJ Abdul Kalam. The director of the film Dr Sriram says, "We are aware that many films have announced their tribute to Dr APJ. The reason we are still proceeding with it because it was not planned after the unfortunate demise of Kalamji. The team had planned the song earlier and we had plans to make Kalam Sir launch them.
Unfortunately, we lost him. But we are continuing with the plan and are launching the song on Dr APJ Abdul Kalam's birth anniversary." The film stars Irfan, Deekshitha, JP and Riyaz Khan.
